Detailed Description

The DataSource class represents a data producer in the system hosted by a device.

Each DataSource provides a list of DataInterface, each of which provides a particular protocol used to transmit and control the data produced by this DataSource.

Definition at line 17 of file DataSource.h.

Values that represent the operational state of a device.

Enumerator

Online 

The device is online.

Member Function Documentation

CPPCli::DataSession CPPCli::DataSource::CreateMjpegStream ( )

Create a new MJPEG stream.

Returns
nullptr if it fails, else the new MJPEG streams DataSession.

Definition at line 17 of file DataSource.cpp.

17  {
18  // Create a data session object
19  VxSdk::IVxDataSession* dataSession;
20 
21  // If the mjpeg protocol is not available on the datasource the result will return VxSdk::VxResult::kActionUnavailable,
22  // otherwise VxSdk::VxResult::kOK
23  VxSdk::VxResult::Value result = _dataSource->CreateMjpegDataSession(dataSession);
24  if (result == VxSdk::VxResult::kOK)
25  return gcnew DataSession(dataSession);
26 
27  return nullptr;
28 }
